title: JR Surfboards The Donny Stoker Yellow/Green Rail Fade
desc:
Easy to ride, care free surfing craft that's fun for everyone,
              paddles well, super fast down the line and great for any level
              of surfing depending on who rides it. The Donny Stoker, a rework on
              design from stokesys first ever pro model. A super easy to surf
              and fun board. The Donny Stoker is a board for total freesurfing
              expression.
features:
The Donny Stoker, a rework on design from stokesys first ever
                   pro model. A super easy to surf and fun board. The Donny
                   Stoker is a board for total freesurfing expression. Easy to
                   ride, care free surfing craft that's fun for everyone,

                   of surfing depending on who rides it.

title: SALT GYPSY DUSTY – PU
desc:
Imagine riding in an old Cadillac… You know how the old classic
              cars just seem to glide and almost float along the road? Well,
              that’s exactly the feel on offer with the Salt Gypsy Dusty
              Longboard; a more retro style Longboard with rails and
              some traditional bottom contours to ensure the whole length of
              the board is usable.
features:
The Donny Stoker, a rework on design from stokesys first ever
                   pro model. A super easy to surf and fun board. The Donny
                   Stoker is a board for total freesurfing expression. Easy to
                   ride, care free surfing craft that's fun for everyone,

                   of surfing depending on who rides it.

title: THREE PALMS BOARD CO DUE BACK HIGHLINE – MX
desc:
Three Palms Due Back surfboards are made using our tough Moulded
     Epoxy (MX) construction and are designed specifically for the rental
     market. This model uses the Modern Highline as its base shape. We have
     an excess of volume to make those early learning stages easy as it will
      be faster to paddle allowing you to catch the wave earlier. To become
      a better surfer you need to catch plenty of waves. This board gives you
       a real shortboard feel.
features:
